comments:
Build ID: Latest source

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a new cp
2. Right click on the cp -> diagrams -> Open Activity Diagram 

The diagram editor would not open and the following exception was in the log

Cannot reproduced on EPF 1.2 20070714 build. Closed it as only occurs on temp dev environment.
